about_the_game:
Design from scratch
Design from scratch and use a blueprint to match all of your clients’ desires. Create beautiful living rooms, bedrooms and kitchens according to their requests and watch as they ooh and aah over your work!


Play blast levels
Keep your mind active and exercise it by playing blast levels. Not only can you have fun, but also win coins for house decorations and progress through the game.


Choose the fitting furniture
When it comes to selecting furniture for your clients’ home, take the time to explore multiple designs and see which fits best with their style. With the ability to compare three different designs side-by-side you can make sure that the furniture you choose is exactly what you envisioned.


Follow the story
When creating designs, it's important to pay attention to your clients' stories. For example, Luke wants something comfortable and easy going. For Ben and Debbie, they're looking to create a cozy family nest. Anna's aim is to make her place inviting for her friends - she's a singer, songwriter, model, and playwright!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G5400 / AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / Nvidia GeForce 710 / AMD Radeon HD 6450
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 6000 / Nvidia GeForce 720 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Join Hazel on her journey as she transforms drab houses into modern and space-saving homes. Solve challenging blast puzzles and choose the best design that meets her clients' requests. Unleash your creativity and let the designing begin!
